value:
What a castle! Wonder how many
guys it took to build this thing...

Wonder how ol' Bord and Cord are
doing...

Let me know if ya run outta firewood.
I'll chop up a mountain for ya.

Fighting's thirsty work! Wanna join
me for a drink?

Try as I might, I'll never repay
Captain Ogma. He's like a giant
among men.

Hey, are you $Nu?$k$pMy summoner bugged me to come
over and say hi to ya. Who? Oh,
$Nf!

Let me show you what these big
ol' arms can do!
This ain't me by half.

Eh, maybe I should just go back
to cuttin' down trees...

I'm feelin' it! Count on me for
whatever you need.

The name's Barst. I used to be a
mercenary—now I'm just a regular
woodcutter.

I joined the Altean army after a
stint as a mercenary... Was a pirate
for a bit after that.$k$pThought I'd retire to the peaceful
life as a woodcutter, but here's
another war needs my attention.$k$pHeh. That's fate for you, I guess.$k$pNot all bad, though—I got to meet
you. Here's to shared fate, eh?$k$pBut don't get too comfortable—
you never know when we might go
our separate ways!
でぇいっ！
うぉらっ！
うああっ！
I'll remember this.
Timmmber!
You're done!
Chaaaaarge!
Ready to die, huh?!
Dammit...
Haha!
Need me for something?
Wha—?! Don't sneak up on a guy like that!
I'm just a guy who chops wood. That's all.
Hey, how ya doing?
Wanna know something? Long time ago I was a pirate for a while.
You give the orders and I'll follow 'em.
Take good care of us on the field, right? Our lives are in your hands.
Hey.
Yep.
Let's do it.
